appTitle.message: AIB Prompts - AI Best Prompts for ChatGPT

AppName.message: AIB Prompts - AI Best Prompts for ChatGPT

AppSlogan.message: Boost your productivity with AIB Prompts - Premium prompts for ChatGPT

reportPromptIntroText.message:
Thanks for helping us improve.

We need you to answer a few questions so we can better understand what's going on with this Prompt.

You'll also have the option to add more info in your own words and add more details to the report.

We take reports seriously.

If we find a rule violation, we'll either remove the Prompt immediately or ask them to revise, or lock or suspend the account.

FeedbackTypeNotitle.message: What would you like to report?

FeedbackScreenText2.message:
Since we are not affiliated with OpenAI or ChatGPT,
we are not responsible for the output of ChatGPT.

FeedbackScreenText21.message:
But we can try to help you with results.

We can do this by looking at the prompt reported,and the output generated.

You can also report your question on our user forum and others will try to help you there, often faster.

FeedbackText.message: Please describe the issue you are having with this prompt.

FeedbackText2.message: Please include your full history of the prompt including the original prompt used.

ReadTermsConditions.message: I read and accept these terms & conditions

RXN_AIBestPrompts_ACCESS_FORBIDDEN.message: The requested action is not allowed.

RXN_AIBestPrompts_OVER_LIMIT_PROMPTS.message:
You can only create new public prompts if all your public prompts have more than 5 upvotes.

You can only create new private prompts if you didn't reach the limit of max. allowed private prompts.

Please try again in a few seconds, in case you just unpublished or deleted another public prompt, or deleted another private prompt.

RXN_AIBestPrompts_QUOTA_EXCEEDED.message: Quota exceeded - please upgrade your account.

RXN_AIBestPrompts_INVALID_PROMPT_TITLE_L.message: The prompt title is not in English.

RXN_AIBestPrompts_INVALID_PROMPT_TEASER_.message: The prompt teaser is not in English.

RXN_AIBestPrompts_INVALID_PROMPT_HINT_LA.message: The prompt hint is not in English.

RXN_AIBestPrompts_INVALID_PROMPT_TITLE_U.message: The prompt title has too many uppercase letters.

RXN_AIBestPrompts_INVALID_PROMPT_TITLE_W.message: The prompt title is too long.

RXN_AIBestPrompts_INVALID_PROMPT_TEASER_.message: The prompt teaser has too many uppercase letters.

RXN_AIBestPrompts_INVALID_PROMPT_HINT_UP.message: The prompt hint has too many uppercase letters.

Somethingwhenrong.message: Something went wrong, please try again later.

CONNECT_ACCOUNT_ANNOUNCEMENT.message:
Connect OpenAI and AIBestPrompts Accounts

We are excited to announce that you can now connect your OpenAI account with your AIBestPrompts account.

This will allow you to save a favorite prompt to the "Favorites" prompts list and to try more of our premium features before subscribing to a premium AIBestPrompts plan.

If you don't have an AIBestPrompts account yet, you can create one for free.

CONNECT_ACCOUNT_TO_USE_FAVORITES.message:
Connect OpenAI and AI Best Prompts Accounts

To use the "Favorites" prompts list, you must connect your OpenAI account with your AIBestPrompts account.
This will allow you to save a favorite prompt to the "Favorites" prompts list.

CONNECT_ACCOUNT_UPGRADE_TO_USE_HIDDEN.message:
Connect OpenAI and AIBestPrompts Accounts

You can hide prompts immediately. To use this feature,you must connect your OpenAI account with your AIBestPrompts account and subscribe to the AIBestPrompts Plus plan or higher.

UPGRADE_ACCOUNT_TO_USE_HIDDEN.message:
Upgrade AIBestPrompts Account

You can hide prompts immediately. To use this feature, please upgrade your AIBestPrompts account to the AIBestPrompts Plus plan or higher.

View available plans here.

UPGRADE_ACCOUNT_HIDDEN_LIST_ITEMS_QUOTA_.message:
Upgrade AIBestPrompts Account

To hide more prompts at the same time, please upgrade your AIBestPrompts account to a plan with more prompts per prompts list.Alternatively, you can remove some prompts from your "Hidden" list to make space for new ones.

View available plans here.

CONNECT_ACCOUNT_UPGRADE_TO_USE_CUSTOM_LI.message:
Connect OpenAI and AIBestPrompts Accounts

To create a custom prompt list, you must connect your OpenAI account with your AIBestPrompts account and subscribe to the AIBestPrompts Plus plan or higher.This will allow you to save your prompts to a custom prompt list.

UPGRADE_ACCOUNT_TO_USE_CUSTOM_LIST.message:
Upgrade AIBestPrompts Account

To create a custom prompt list, you need to upgrade to the AIBestPrompts Plus plan or higher.

View available plans here.

UPGRADE_ACCOUNT_CUSTOM_LIST_QUOTA_EXCEED.message:
Upgrade AIBestPrompts Account

To create a new custom prompt list, please upgrade your AIBestPrompts account to a plan with more prompts lists.

View available plans here.

UPGRADE_ACCOUNT_LIST_QUOTA_EXCEEDED.message:
Upgrade AIBestPrompts Account

You have reached your maximum allowed prompts lists. To create more prompts lists, please upgrade your AIBestPrompts account.

View available plans here.

UPGRADE_ACCOUNT_LIST_ITEM_QUOTA_EXCEEDED.message:
Upgrade AIBestPrompts Account

You have reached your maximum allowed prompts per prompts list. To add more prompts to this list, please upgrade your AIBestPrompts account.

View available plans here.

CONNECT_ACCOUNT_TO_USE_PRIVATE_PROMPTS.message:
Connect OpenAI and AIBestPrompts Accounts

To use private prompts, you must connect your OpenAI account with your AIBestPrompts account.This will allow you to create a private prompt that is only visible to you.

UPGRADE_ACCOUNT_PRIVATE_PROMPTS_QUOTA_EX.message:
Upgrade AIBestPrompts Account

You have exceeded the number of private prompts allowed in your account. If you just deleted another private prompt, please try again in a few seconds.

To create more private prompts, please upgrade your AIBestPrompts account to a plan allowing more private prompts.
View available plans here.

UPGRADE_ACCOUNT_PUBLIC_PROMPTS_QUOTA_EXC.message:
Upgrade AIBestPrompts Account

All your allowed upcoming prompts have less than ${MIN_PUBLIC_PROMPT_VOTES_THRESHOLD} upvotes.You can only create a new upcoming public prompts if all your public prompts have more than ${MIN_PUBLIC_PROMPT_VOTES_THRESHOLD} upvotes.If you just unpublished or deleted another upcoming prompt, please try again in a few seconds.

To create more upcoming prompts at once, you can upgrade to the AIBestPrompts Pro plan.
View available plans here.

CONNECT_ACCOUNT_PROMPT_QUOTA_EXCEEDED.message:
Connect OpenAI and AIBestPrompts Accounts

You can only create new upcoming public prompts if all your public prompts have more than ${MIN_PUBLIC_PROMPT_VOTES_THRESHOLD} upvotes.You can only create new private prompts if you didn't reach the limit of the max. allowed private prompts in your account.

Connect your OpenAI account with your AIBestPrompts account to be able to create more prompts.

Then you can also upgrade your AIBestPrompts account to a plan with more private and upcoming public prompts, or purchase multiple plans of the same type.
View available plans here.

UPGRADE_ACCOUNT_PROMPT_QUOTA_EXCEEDED.message:
Upgrade AIBestPrompts Account

You can only create new upcoming public prompts if all your public prompts have more than ${MIN_PUBLIC_PROMPT_VOTES_THRESHOLD} upvotes.You can only create new private prompts if you didn't reach the limit of the max. allowed private prompts in your account.

Please try again in a few seconds, if you just unpublished or deleted another upcoming public prompt, or deleted another private prompt.

To be able to create more prompts, you can upgrade your AIBestPrompts account to a plan with more private and upcoming public prompts, or purchase multiple plans of the same type.
View available plans here.

UPGRADE_ACCOUNT_CUSTOM_TONE_WRITING_STYL.message:
Upgrade AIBestPrompts Account

Upgrade to the AIBestPrompts Plus plan to get additional Tones and Writing Styles.Upgrade to the AIBestPrompts Pro plan to even add your own custom Tones and Writing Styles.

View available plans here.

UPGRADE_ACCOUNT_POWER_CONTINUE.message:
Upgrade AIBestPrompts Account

Upgrade to a premium plan to activate the Power Continue feature.

View available plans here.

CONNECT_ACCOUNT_UPGRADE_AIBestPrompts_VE.message:
Connect OpenAI and AIBestPrompts Accounts

To use the "Prompts VIP" list, you must connect your OpenAI account with your AIBestPrompts account and subscribe to the AIBestPrompts Pro plan.

UPGRADE_ACCOUNT_AIBestPrompts_VERIFIED_L.message:
Upgrade AIBestPrompts Account

To use the Prompts VIP list, you must subscribe to the AIBestPrompts Pro plan or higher.

View available plans here.

CONNECT_ACCOUNT_VIEW_PROMPT_TEMPLATE_SOU.message:
Connect OpenAI and AIBestPrompts Accounts

To view prompt template source, you must connect your OpenAI account with your AIBestPrompts account and subscribe to the AIBestPrompts Premium plan or higher.

UPGRADE_ACCOUNT_VIEW_PROMPT_TEMPLATE_SOU.message:
Upgrade AIBestPrompts Account

To view prompt template source, you must subscribe to the AIBestPrompts Premium plan or higher.

View available plans here.
